entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Non-English output from `build.cmd` are displayed as gibberish #90069
  • Dynamically adding nested properties when using an ExpandoObject instance #90064
  • Move `Compiler/Win32Resources` and their namespace to more general place #90063
  • TimeProvider GetLocalNow enhancement #90060
    Future

Closed

  • [Blazor] Slow startup and navigation when debugging #80446
    8.0.0
  • DebuggerTests.MiscTests.CannotDebugLazyLoadedAssemblyWithoutPdb test timed out on CI #81294
    8.0.0
  • CheckProjects test failing #89993
    8.0.0
  • MayBeNullWhen(false) Not Applied #90062
  • why Conserve memory dont have in runtimeconfig.json #88013
    8.0.0
  • Track the New Dynamic Heap Configurations via the GC Configuration API. #87030
    9.0.0
  • String.Replace(char, char) now slower in some cases #74771
    7.0.0
  • GC.AllocateUninitializedArray has regressed on macOS #65198
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 188 Regressions from GC changes #74014
    8.0.0
  • Perf measurement changed due to BDN update #66664
    8.0.0
  • BenchmarksGame.BinaryTrees benchmarks have regressed #67958
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_GC<Char> and ByteMark #66665
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_GC<Byte> #72477
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add note about creating arrays using newobj #90070
    area-Meta
  • Fix mono's Wsingle-bit-bitfield-constant-conversion #90068
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix an assert and clean up a codegen issue #90067
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TimeProvider GetLocalNow enhancement #90066
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [mono][aot] Use g_strcasecmp () to check whenever aot input assemblie… #90065
    area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • [wasm] Fix startup without emcc -g option #89872
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [NativeAOT] Do not suppress inlining of random threadstatics #90055
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Try to enable some JIT tests #89739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Emit armv8.4 ldapur* for volatile loads with contained offsets #89681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Optimize nullcheck for Interlocked.* operations #87297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Reserve FOH segments in ExecutionAllocator and properly report them to debugger #90047
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix stack overflow handling on Unix #89799
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Rename area-ILVerification to area-Tools-ILVerification #89698
    area-Meta
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Recover some lost EH performance on Unix amd64 #90033
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2237008 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][debugger] Support debug inline array #90026
    area-Debugger-mono
  • proof of concept #90058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Fix host debug view not showing services before start #89610
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [ARM64] Use SHRN in SpanHelpers.CountValueType #89632
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add g_GCShadowEnd to JIT_WriteBarrier_Table #90036
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] ARM64 vector right-shift must dead-code eliminate if the constant is zero. #90051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • By value out fixes #89982
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Upgrade DNNE to build incrementally #89594
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-05

Issues

Created

  • Illegal instruction on ARM64 Linux #34473

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Static fields in interfaces should cause the compiler to emit `beforefieldinit` on the interface #69413
  • Better codegen for conditional-access + pattern checks. #69411
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34004.299 #69408

Closed

  • Formatting for stackalloc as a parameter lost one indentation #65498
  • Improve places where CS1661 is reported #69322

PullRequests

Created

  • Support converting arrays, whose elements are assigned afterwards, to a collection expression. #69415
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to recommend updating stackalloc expressions to use collection expressions. #69414
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Simplify .Kind() checks in the IDE layers. #69409
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extract collection-expression creation code into its own helper type. #69407
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Format stackalloc initializers like array initializers. #69410
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Move from LanguageVersion.Preview to LanguageVersionExtensions.CSharpNext #69399
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve location that lambda errors are reported at. #69334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add LanguageVersion for C# 12 #69383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement lambda params with modifiers without type name #69273
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Exceptions.ThrowEFail() should always be thrown. #69288
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Prototype of a public API (though currently internal) for roslyn features to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Add custom project contexts endpoint #69374
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implementation for Regex QuickInfo Provider and it includes documentation for Regular Expressions. #69405
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Controllers not loaded when using TestServer with UseStartup<T>(Func<WebHostBuilderContext, T> startupFactory) #49887
  • QuickGrid Unable to use Length when in a TemplateColumn #49886
  • HttpClient exceptions crushes the debugger when using Docker #49885
  • I'm not sure what you mean by a real world example, but you can look at how the authenticator token provider as an example: https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/blob/main/src/Identity/Extensions.Core/src/AuthenticatorTokenProvider.cs #49883
  • Isolating CSS for component use from Razor class library not working #49881

Closed

  • RDG throws at startup when combined with PublishAot and AuthorizationMiddleware #49855
  • Investigate thread safety of GetReadOnlyTypeInfo and SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter #49849

PullRequests

Merged

  • Tweak configuration of JsonSerializerOptions #49875
    area-mvc, area-minimal, 8.0-rc1
  • Rename hosting, routing and error handling metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49743
    area-hosting, 8.0-rc1
  • Rename SignalR transport metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49766
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc1
  • Rename rate limiting middleware metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49749
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc1
  • Rename Kestrel metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49747
    area-runtime, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2236978 #49575
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] Improve auto render mode selection strategy #49858
    area-blazor

entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Binding Content Not Showing in SwipeView (Used Inside CollectionView) #16567

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16536
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
